name: Anno 1503
summary: Anno 1503: The New World (known in North America as 1503 A.D.: The New World) is a game with both real time strategy and city building elements, developed by Austria-based Max Design company. It revolves around building and maintaining a 16th century colony in the New World. It is the sequel to Anno 1602 and the predecessor to Anno 1701.
info:
